Event.name: Appointing
Event.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Selector</fen>, often an individual in a leadership role, appoints a <fen>Official</fen> to assume an official <fen>Role</fen> in an organization (which can be expressed as the <fen>Body</fen>).
<ex><fex name="Selector">Press secretaries</fex> <t>accredit</t> <fex name="Official">journalists</fex> <fex name="Body">to the sessions</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Selector
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Selector</fen> is responsible for the appointment of the new official. Typically, it occurs as the External Argument of verbs.</def-root>

Arg.name: Official
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Official</fen> is a person appointed to a recognized position.</def-root>

Arg.name: Role
Arg.definition: <def-root>Frequently, the <fen>Official</fen> is referred to only by his/her role. However, the <fen>Role</fen> can be expressed separately from the leader, usually as either a secondary predicate or in a PP Complement (headed by <m>as</m>).</def-root>

Arg.name: Degree
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE indicates the <fen>Degree</fen> to which an event occurs.</def-root>

Arg.name: Depictive
Arg.definition: <def-root><fen>Depictive</fen> indicates the state of one of the participants during the action.</def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE is used for the <fen>Manner</fen> of performing an action.</def-root>

Arg.name: Means
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Means</fen> by which the <fen>Selector</fen> accomplishes the designation of the <fen>Official</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Result
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE is used for indicating the <fen>Result</fen> of an event.</def-root>

Arg.name: Circumstances
Arg.definition: <def-root>This frame element describes the situation that brought about the new appointment. </def-root>

Arg.name: Function
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Function</fen> is the purpose the <fen>Official</fen> will fufill.
<ex>Under the new program, SCC will <t>accredit</t> organizations <fex name="Function">to assess wood flow from certified forests to workshops or factories</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition: <def-root>When the designation of the official takes place.</def-root>

Arg.name: Body
Arg.definition: <def-root>A group of individuals who are elected or appointed to perform some function, and to which the <fen>Official</fen> is assigned.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: accredit.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: give authority to act in an official role.

lexUnit.name: appoint.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: assign a job or role to.

lexUnit.name: designate.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: give a specified position or status to

lexUnit.name: finger.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: identify or choose (someone) for a particular purpose.

lexUnit.name: tap.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: designate or select for a task or honour.

lexUnit.name: name.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: designate someone to perform a duty.
